news_header: A Delta Airlines flight crashed while landing at Toronto's Pearson International Airport, injuring at least 19 people. Severe storms in the South have resulted in at least 12 deaths, with ongoing rescue efforts in Kentucky.
news_original_title: News Wrap: Delta flight crashes in Toronto, injuring at least 8 people
news_text: In the Middle East, an Israeli drone strike killed a Hamas military leader, and families of Israeli hostages marked 500 days since their loved ones were taken. Pope Francis is being treated for a respiratory infection, and a rare artifact from George Washington is up for sale.
